name: diva-holesky.public.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Liquid Staking protocol powered by Distributed Validators (DVT).
description:
Diva is an Ethereum Liquid Staking protocol powered by Distributed Validator Technology (DVT).

It extends Ethereum's Proof of Stake providing new functionality for Stakers and Operators:

- **[Liquid Stakers](https://docs.divastaking.net/diva/entities/stakers)** receive divETH, a Liquid Staking Token which accrues Ethereum Staking Rewards.
- **[Operators](https://docs.divastaking.net/diva/entities/operators)** run a **Di**stributed **Va**lidation node to fulfill staking duties and earn additional divETH Operator Rewards.

Ethereum's staking rewards are distributed among the Diva network participants according to their contributions.

divETH is a receipt token and its balance updates daily to reflect the deposited ETH balance plus its accrued Ethereum staking rewards.

While other solutions have some of these features, **Diva is the first solution that fully integrates Liquid Staking with [Distributed Validation](https://docs.divastaking.net/category/distributed-validators-technology-dvt)**, offering both Liquid Stakers and Operators the most efficient functionality.
author: Bertho
